title: 365 - Which of The 6 Creative Types Are You?
description:

author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Co-Loop Podcast Network)
content:encoded:
Listen and Subscribe on Apple, Spotify and more: https://link.chtbl.com/creativepeptalk

Support the show at patreon.com/creativepeptalk!

Transcripts available at creativepeptalk.com/episodes!
itunes:title: 365 - Which of The 6 Creative Types Are You?
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
You wouldn’t get very far as a basketball player, if you played by the rules of soccer. Can you imagine? Trying to play without touching the ball with your hands? It’d be ridiculous! Actually impossible! And yet, in your creativity, you let other people’s creative rules and values make you feel disqualified all the time.

You’ve heard it before “the only rule in creativity is that there are no rules”, so why do we constantly feel like imposters who are “doing it wrong”? 

I have a hypothesis:
Because we don’t realize that creativity means very different things to each and every artist. We all define and value creativity extremely differently.

In this episode I want to help you figure out what creativity is about for you. When you start to figure out why YOU love creative work, you can let go of what OTHERS think it’s about and thrive in your own way. 

Let these frameworks help define where you’re going next.

This episode was originally released as 280 in June 2020.
